name: Bio multi rosso — Solevita — 1 L
ingredients: eau, jus de fruits à base de jus concentrés* (orange* 12%, pomme* 5.1%, citron 4.6%, mûre 0.1%, myrtille* 0.1%, griotte* 0.1%), jus de betteraves rouges à base de jus concentré*, sucre*, arôme naturel
Nome generico: Boisson biologique aux fruits à base de fruits concentrés et de jus de betteraves rouges concentré
Confezionamento: brique, carton, FSC Mix, 84, Pure-Pak, Tidyman wastebasket, Food safe
Categorie: Cibi e bevande a base vegetale, Bevande, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages, Vegetable-based foods and beverages, Vegetable-based beverages, Sugared beverages
